actions.title: Notify Provider Using SBAR
steps: Gather baseline and current objective findings (vitals, symptoms, focused assessment).
Call provider and communicate using SBAR.
Read back orders as required and document orders received.

actions.title: Initiate Precautions
steps: Use Standard Precautions for all residents.
Add Transmission-Based Precautions when indicated by symptoms/diagnosis.
Post signage and ensure PPE supplies are available.
Use dedicated equipment when required and clean high-touch surfaces.
